extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of Junos OS or Junos OS Evolved.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected devices to a fixed version of Junos OS or Junos OS Evolved.

cve_id: Junos OS and Junos OS Evolved Vulnerability
affected_products: Junos OS Evolved: All versions before 21.4R3-S4-EVO, from 22.1-EVO before 22.1R3-S4-EVO, from 22.3-EVO before 22.3R3-S1-EVO, and from 22.4-EVO before 22.4R2-S1-EVO
